definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: White spot syndrome virus (WSSV) disease is a key problem in shrimp culture industry in Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 对虾WSSV病是亚洲对虾养殖业中的一个棘手问题。

sentences.english: White spot syndrome virus (WSSV) disease is a key problem in shrimp culture industry in Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 对虾WSSV病是亚洲对虾养殖业中的一个棘手问题。

sentences.english: Marinade during cooking to be a strong, tight package shrimp for tasty.
sentences.chinese: 烹制时卤汁要浓厚，紧包对虾，以便入味。

sentences.english: Offer all kinds of specific roasted eel prawn and fillet.
sentences.chinese: 供应各种规格的高品质烤鳗鱼，对虾，鱼片。

sentences.english: It typically has a few different types of fish, clams, mussels and prawns.
sentences.chinese: 它通常由好几种鱼类，蛤蜊，贻贝和对虾熬成。

sentences.english: Mr.Wood, the shipment of frozen prawn arrived in Singapore on November 10.
sentences.chinese: 伍德先生，那批冻对虾于11月10人哦抵达新加坡。

sentences.english: Therefore, WSSV has been extensively studied, resulting in some exciting research progress.
sentences.chinese: 有关对虾白斑症病毒病，已积累了丰富的的研究资料。

sentences.english: Process of sperm penetration in shrimp, Penaeus chinensis was observed.
sentences.chinese: 利用光镜和电镜对中国对虾精子入卵过程进行了观察。

sentences.english: The quality and stability of white shrimp(Penaeus vannamei) product was studied and refined.
sentences.chinese: 研究并提高南美白对虾即食加工制品品质和贮藏性。

sentences.english: The morphology of cortical reactions during oocytes activation in shrimp Penaeus chinensis is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 报道了对中国对虾卵子激活反应的形态学研究。

sentences.english: Prawn aquaculture is the industry of important economy pillar of Asia area.
sentences.chinese: 对虾养殖业是东南亚地区的重要经济支柱产业。

sentences.english: Nisin in extending the shelf life of shrimp mince was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了乳酸链球菌素对虾肉糜保鲜的作用效果。

sentences.english: Draw a dress and a prawn.
sentences.chinese: 画一件服装和一只对虾。

sentences.english: He also makes home-brewed beer that he trades for prawns from trawlers that sometimes anchor off shore.
sentences.chinese: 他也自酿啤酒以与过往靠岸停泊的旅行者们交换对虾。

sentences.english: Avoid all types of shellfish, prawns and smoked fish.
sentences.chinese: 避免所有类型的贝类，对虾和熏鱼。

sentences.english: The country is also rich in fishery resources like prawn and seashell.
sentences.chinese: 渔业资源丰富，盛产对虾及贝类等水产品。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
Croceine croaker (Pseudosciaena crocea), a fish popular in Cantonese cooking
turbot/European imported turbot/same as 大菱鮃|大菱鲆
oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense), a species of freshwater shrimp
